lead_paragraph: The people of Lieyu Township on Lesser Kinmen Island are linked to Taipei but have prospered as trade and tourism with the mainland have blossomed.

headline.print_headline: Caught Between China and Taiwan. Leaning Toward China.
headline.main: An Island Tethered to Taiwan, but Leaning Toward China

snippet: The people of Lieyu Township on Lesser Kinmen Island are linked to Taipei but have prospered as trade and tourism with the mainland have blossomed.
abstract: Lieyu Township Journal; Kinman Island and Lesser Kinman Island, officially part of China's Fujian province but largely not controlled by People's Republic of China, are caught in complicated interplay between local population, Taiwan and China; residents of tiny Lieyu Township on Lesser Kinman express loyalty to China, but formal independence bid by Taiwan may affect balance of power.
